meanings.sent1: She discoed all night at the party.
meanings.sent2: They discoed together at the discotheque.
meanings.sent3: The cat discoed around the living room, chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: The leaves discoed in the wind, creating a mesmerizing dance.
meanings.sent5: The children discoed joyfully to the upbeat music.

meanings.sent1: Last night, she discoed until dawn.
meanings.sent2: They discoed at the concert last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The robot discoed awkwardly on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: The memories of the discoed night lingered in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The stars discoed across the night sky, twinkling brightly.

meanings.definition: Having the style or fashion of disco music.
meanings.sent1: She wore a discoed outfit to the themed party.
meanings.sent2: The room was decorated with discoed lights and colors.
meanings.sent3: His discoed shoes sparkled under the disco ball.
meanings.sent4: The discoed atmosphere transported them back to the '70s.
meanings.sent5: The discoed theme added a fun and retro vibe to the event.
